main event: A bright meteor was sighted in the Columbus and Hilliard area of Ohio between May 22-30, 1965.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 1 to 2 minutes., The object was observed visually from the ground., The course of the object was northeast., The report suggests the object may have been a meter due to the duration being longer than typical., There were weather conditions reported during the sighting consistent with visibility.
witness description: One civilian witness observed the event.
